product_name: Royal Robbins Flynn Stripe Polo Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from hemp that's blended with cotton and spandex, the Royal Robbins Flynn Stripe Polo Shirt features a slight texture and a touch of stretch for good looks and ease of movement on casual outings.
short_description: Made from hemp that's blended with cotton and spandex, the Royal Robbins Flynn Stripe Polo Shirt features a slight texture and a touch of stretch for good looks and ease of movement on casual outings.
